subject: World Cup 2010 (Soccer)
Soccer
World Cup (Soccer)
lead_paragraph: The United States’ loss to Ghana was seen by 19.4 million people on ESPN and Univision — an audience as large as that for last year’s World Series.
snippet: The United States’ loss to Ghana was seen by 19.4 million people on ESPN and Univision — an audience as large as that for last year’s World Series.
